conversion_verification.notes: Second image shows extruded walls with thickness, visible floor plane, and an elevated angled view with the ceiling removed to reveal interior spaces.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Clear 3D extrusion with readable wall corners and interior volume; cutaway is clean. View is slightly near-top-down but still angled and volumetric.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Overall room layout matches: foyer/closets at left, living room bottom-left, dining bottom-center, pantry central, kitchen right, playroom top-right, stairs top-center. Minor proportional/edge alignment differences on some exterior jogs and openings.

interior_elements.notes: Major furniture and fixtures present: living seating, dining table, kitchen counters/island, playroom seating; bathroom/WC represented. A few elements are simplified and not fully detailed.

visual_clarity.notes: Geometry is readable with distinguishable walls/floors/openings, but lighting is somewhat flat/soft and text labels inside rooms reduce presentation cleanliness.

detected_errors.description: Some door/window/opening placements and/or proportions appear simplified compared to the 2D plan (not all swings/details are represented).
Minor layout/proportion drift on certain exterior wall jogs and a few internal partition extents versus the 2D plan (overall adjacency preserved).
Room name text labels are visible in the 3D render, reducing presentation cleanliness.

summary: A true cutaway 3D conversion with strong overall layout fidelity and furnishings, with only minor proportional and opening-detail mismatches plus visible text labels.
